## Project

```{r}

library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(gganimate)

rawdata <- read_csv("data/pollution.csv")

```

Research Question:

I want to group by continent, sum the total count of each continent, and create a histogram that shows continent vs count for 1 year.

```{r}

filtered <- rawdata |>
  filter(Dim2ValueCode == "GHECAUSE_GHE000000", Dim1ValueCode == "SEX_BTSX")

continent <- filtered |>
  group_by(ParentLocation, Period) |>
  mutate(count = sum(FactValueNumeric))

filtered <- filtered |>
  group_by(Location, Period) |>
  mutate(count = sum(FactValueNumeric))

continent

```
```{r}

ggplot(data = continent, aes(x = ParentLocation)) +
  geom_bar() +
  # Here comes the gganimate code
  transition_states(
    Period,
    transition_length = 2,
    state_length = 1
  ) +
  enter_fade() +
  exit_shrink() +
  ease_aes('sine-in-out')
  

```
